sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>15</base_damage> <critical_rating>2</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>The most common explosive material found, Detonite is extremely stable and comes in a putty-like substance, making it easy to shape for demolition purposes. +10 damage on a hit.</description> <description_html><![CDATA[The most common explosive material found, Detonite is extremely stable and comes in a putty-like substance, making it easy to shape for demolition purposes. +10 damage on a hit.]]></description_html> <encumbrance>2</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Detonite</name> <number>GEAR0001179</number> <price>50</price> <range>short</range> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Mechanics (Int)">5d10155cdbae88542901de90cf96190a</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_class_name/> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-12-19 05:46:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f6d962eb2f81a010e0f497eef699b6ed</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 23:46:20</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
